Rationale: There are three Gold tokens in the player’s pool and two on the Vault.
game_state_description: Single tableau. Vault artifact holds 2 Gold; player mat shows 3 Gold plus assorted other essences.
Question: If the player were to activate all of their powers left to right, how many essences would they have in their essence pool at the end? Format as Original Number: <num>, New Number: <num>, Amount Changed: <num>
Answer: Original Number: 5, New Number: 2, Amount Changed: -3
